text.Prompt:
Using the product specifications and product title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product title:
National Tree 30 Inch Crestwood Spruce Wreath with Cones, Glitter, Red Berries, Silver Bristle and 50 Battery Operated Warm White LED Lights (CW7-309L-30W-B1)

Product specifications:
30" Diameter
Trimmed with red berries, pine cones and glitter
Pre-strung with 50 UL listed Warm White LED Lights; Battery operated with integrated 6 hours On/18 hours Off timer
Fire-resistant and non-allergenic
For Indoor or Covered Outdoor Display

Product description:
text.Response A: This National Tree 30 Inch Crestwood Spruce Wreath with Cones, Glitter, Red Berries, Silver Bristle and 50 Battery Operated Warm White LED Lights is the perfect addition to your holiday decor. The elegant and classic design of this wreath is trimmed with red berries, pine cones, and glitter, giving it a warm and inviting look. The pre-strung 50 UL listed warm white LED lights add a touch of elegance and brightness to the wreath. The battery-operated design allows for easy and convenient placement, as it requires no power outlet. The 6 hours on/18 hours off timer ensures that the wreath will automatically turn off after 6 hours, and turn back on again 18 hours later. This wreath is fire-resistant and non-allergenic, making it safe to use both indoors and covered outdoors.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

Prompt

Using the product specifications and product title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product title:
National Tree 30 Inch Crestwood Spruce Wreath with Cones, Glitter, Red Berries, Silver Bristle and 50 Battery Operated Warm White LED Lights (CW7-309L-30W-B1)

Product specifications:
30" Diameter
Trimmed with red berries, pine cones and glitter
Pre-strung with 50 UL listed Warm White LED Lights; Battery operated with integrated 6 hours On/18 hours Off timer
Fire-resistant and non-allergenic
For Indoor or Covered Outdoor Display

Product description:

Response A

This National Tree 30 Inch Crestwood Spruce Wreath with Cones, Glitter, Red Berries, Silver Bristle and 50 Battery Operated Warm White LED Lights is the perfect addition to your holiday decor. The elegant and classic design of this wreath is trimmed with red berries, pine cones, and glitter, giving it a warm and inviting look. The pre-strung 50 UL listed warm white LED lights add a touch of elegance and brightness to the wreath. The battery-operated design allows for easy and convenient placement, as it requires no power outlet. The 6 hours on/18 hours off timer ensures that the wreath will automatically turn off after 6 hours, and turn back on again 18 hours later. This wreath is fire-resistant and non-allergenic, making it safe to use both indoors and covered outdoors.
